article.title: ITT Wins $160 Million Navy Systems Engineering Support Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: ITT Corporation's communications system business has received a five-year, cost-plus-fixed-fee contract by the Space and Naval Warfare Systems Command. The contract has a potential value of $160 million. ITT will provide field and systems engineering support services for the U.S. Navy's Fleet Systems Engineering Team.
